entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
